licence_overview: To operate an independent health-care service such as a private hospital or clinic, you need to register with the [Care Quality Commission (CQC)](http://www.cqc.org.uk/ "Care Quality Commission (CQC)"){:rel="external"} in England or the [Healthcare Inspectorate Wales (HIW)](http://www.hiw.org.uk/ "Healthcare Inspectorate Wales (HIW)"){:rel="external"} in Wales.
licence_short_description: Register to run an independent health care service (eg private hospital or clinic) in England and Wales.
overview: You need to register with the Care Quality Commission or Healthcare Inspectorate to run an independent health care service (eg private hospital or clinic) in England and Wales
title: Registration of independent health care service (England and Wales)
